posts.title: Tire Traction Cover
posts.content: Remain in control of your vehicle when travelling through icy roads by equipping it with these tire traction covers. These lightweight covers are easy to install and offer a convenient temporary solution when you need to give your tires a little extra traction.

posts.title: Potato Chip Bag Resealer
posts.content: Keep your chips as fresh as the day you first opened them by using the potato chip bag resealer. With one simple swipe along the open end of the bag, this handy little device creates an air-tight seal that keeps the delicious contents fresh and crunchy.

posts.title: Hot Cheese Dispensing Gun
posts.content: Instantly improve any dish by dousing it with this hot cheese dispensing gun. After filling the hollow cartridge with your favorite cheese, the gun will quickly heat up and melt the cheese so that you can easily spray it over any dish, or simply create fun cheesy doodles.

posts.title: Tug Preventing Dog Trainer
posts.content: Train your dog to stop pulling on the leash when you walk with this tug preventing dog trainer. Every time old Sparky pulls on the leash, this clever device will emit a harmless ultrasonic tone that only the he can hear, encouraging him to stop pulling and tugging.

posts.title: Under Desk Gun Holster
posts.content: Be prepared for anything the rat race throws at you by keeping your piece handy with the under desk gun holster. The tough synthetic plate features an elastic holster able to accommodate virtually any type of handgun so it’s always there when you need it.

posts.title: Paint By Numbers Kit
posts.content: Paint by numbers is the easy-to-follow kit that helps you create amazing masterpieces even if you have no artistic skills. Simply match the numbers to the corresponding color of paint and watch as the work of art appears right in front of your very eyes.

posts.title: Pig USB Hub
posts.content: Keep all your important information stored and always at hand with this adorable pig USB hub. This barnyard inspired USB hub is shaped like a plump and happy mama pig feeding her three little USB piglets so they’re ready when you need them.

posts.title: Battery Organizer
posts.content: Keep every single battery in your possession organized and always at hand with this handy battery organizer. It’s made from durable plastic and features a slew of specially designed slots made to perfectly fit every type of battery, from AAA to 9V.

posts.title: Knight Toilet Paper Holder
posts.content: With the economy in the dumps, the knights of the round table decided to take whatever jobs they could find. The knight toilet paper holder will perform his dooty without question and will make sure your royal bottom is patted dry like only a high knight can.

posts.title: Compact Wilderness Survival Tool
posts.content: Easily carry everything you need to survive the great outdoors in your pocket with this compact wilderness survival tool. Forged from metal, this credit card sized tool contains six useful tools ranging from fish hooks to snare locks and sewing needles.

posts.title: Multi-Tool Survival Axe
posts.content: This multi-tool survival axe is the only tool you’ll need next time you head into the wild. Made from carbon steel, you’ll be able to easily perform tasks like cut down a tree, tell time, shoot an arrow, or single-handedly rebuild civilization.

posts.title: Astronaut’s Freeze Dried Ice Cream
posts.content: Get a taste of what life as a space explorer is like by snacking on some astronaut freeze dried ice cream. This out of this world treat is freeze dried into compact bars and vacuum sealed in special foil pouches so you can enjoy them without creating a sticky mess.
